title: Now this i...
description: Now this is the one social party game I do like! So easy to play and really funny. The art on the coasters is beautiful, but could just as well be played in a bar with standard coasters or playing cards.Great bluffing game, very easy to teach.

title: This boils...
description: This boils down the bluffing liar's dice and those type games down to what it really should be.  I think it might do better than Liar's Dice in all but one area.  I think Skull is great with 4-6, maybe even 7 or 8 would be okay.  But 9-12.  I think it just gets too long and too hard to keep track of what's going on.

title: Used UNO p...
description: Used UNO pack to simulate the experience. Works a treat. Thanks SU&SD!

title: Absolutely...
description: Absolutely beautiful but also beautifully dull. Maybe the game is more fun if you're drunk and in a bar? But then you'd have to be in a bar. We finished playing and there was a collective "that wasn't fun".

title: Great bluf...
description: Great bluffing game - with bluffing and nothing else. Can get very deep into a player's head.

title: I've got t...
description: I've got to say this really has not clicked, I may give it another try or two but after a few attempts, I think I'd generally rather pull out Tsuro in most situations.

title: I AM THE K...
description: I AM THE KING OF FLOWERS

title: A great li...
description: A great little game. So much fun, and laughs all around with this one. It is simple, beautiful art, fun interactions, & it plays so quickly too! One of my favorites to be sure.

title: Great bidd...
description: Great bidding game that's easy to explain and quick to play.

title: This captu...
description: This captures captures everything I like about poker in a smaller, cleaner, & quicker package. It may not be as skill intensive, but I 100% prefer it over poker in a casual setting. Beautiful and easy to teach too.

title: This is a ...
description: This is a really interesting game. It's an entirely abstract betting game, but so simple and unique. I feel like there are very few groups I wouldn't feel comfortable breaking this out with.

title: A great gr...
description: A great group game where a meta game quickly develops. Very easy to get in to. Just make sure to explain the motivations behind each action in the game.

title: Dead simpl...
description: Dead simple bluffing game about lying and flipping coasters. Gorgeous components and art draw people to the game. The game itself is fine.
